plot: How the methamphetamine epidemic has ravaged rural Franklin County, Missouri. Details on the personal effects of the drug as well as how the police, EMS and court systems are dealing with the problem.
title: Meth: A County in Crisis
plot_es: How the methamphetamine epidemic has ravaged rural Franklin County, Missouri. Details on the personal effects of the drug as well as how the police, EMS and court systems are dealing with the problem.
plot_en: How the methamphetamine epidemic has ravaged rural Franklin County, Missouri. Details on the personal effects of the drug as well as how the police, EMS and court systems are dealing with the problem.
